bottomLeftBox.quote: “I think it’s somewhat unharmful because there is no bias in the race of the weddings being shown, but there is a bias in the couples all being heterosexual.”

bottomRightBox.quote: “There is heteronormative bias here, and lgbt+ people are definitely left out and harmed by the bias the algorithm is exhibiting. There's also a...child wedding? Not sure how that got there but that's not okay.”
